details:
Case 61 is a 57 year-old male Singapore Citizen with no recent travel history to China. He is linked to the cluster at Grace Assembly of God.

He reported onset of symptoms on 6 February, and sought treatment at a GP clinic on the same day and again on 8 February. He went to Ng Teng Fong General Hospital on 9 February and Pioneer Polyclinic on 11 February and 12 February. Subsequent test results confirmed COVID-19 infection on 13 February afternoon.

Prior to hospital admission, he reported that he had mostly stayed at home at Jurong West Street 64, except to go to work for a day at Legacy Office Supplies Pte Ltd (56 Senang Crescent).

He has fully recovered from the infection and have been discharged from hospital today (4 March).
